@jmchen-g thanks, but the document is not consistent with the actual behavier.

set b to False, and add tf.Print to f1() will get no output at all, which means f1 is not invoked when the condition is False.

the changed f1():

def f1():
    print ('f1')
    with tf.control_dependencies([increase_tfvar_op]):
        return tf.Print(-tfvar, data=[tfvar]) ;
